arm_group.description: The investigators are novice on optiscope. They will perform intubation using optiscope to patients scheduled elective surgery.

brief_summary.textblock:
Optiscope (Clarus Medical, Minneapolis, MN, USA) is a semi-rigid fiberscope for endotracheal
      intubation. This study will investigate learning curve of Optiscope by anesthesia providers.

clinical_study.brief_title: Learning Curve of Optiscope by Anesthesia Providers

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Patient who is scheduled general anesthesia for elective surgery

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  patient who is anticipated difficult airway

          -  patient who is needed rapid sequence induction

          -  Cervical injury

intervention.description: Optiscope (Clarus Medical, Minneapolis, MN, USA) is a semi-rigid fiberscope designed for endotracheal intubation. Anesthetic providers who are novice on optiscope will perform intubation using optiscope.

clinical_study.official_title: Learning Curve of Optiscope by Anesthesia Providers

primary_outcome.description: Time to intubation (from optiscope insertion to the detection of end tidal CO2) will be recorded. If time to inubation is longer than 180 s or pulse oxymetry is lower than 94%, mask ventilation will be performed. If intubation is not successful within 3 trials, it will be performed using direct laryngoscope.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.
